Secondary - Compare level apoptosis patient treat drug two different administration schedule . OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group study . Patients undergo fine needle aspiration punch biopsy target lesion . Patients randomize 1 8 treatment arm begin therapy within 30 day biopsy . - Arm I : Patients apply topical imiquimod target lesion every 12 hour day 1 2 total 4 dos . - Arm II : Patients apply topical placebo target lesion every 12 hour day 1 2 total 4 dos . - Arm III : Patients apply topical imiquimod target lesion every 24 hour day 1-4 total 4 dos . - Arm IV : Patients apply topical placebo target lesion every 24 hour day 1-4 total 4 dos . - Arm V : Patients apply topical imiquimod target lesion every 12 hour day 1-4 total 8 dos . - Arm VI : Patients apply topical placebo target lesion every 12 hour day 1-4 total 8 dos . - Arm VII : Patients apply topical imiquimod target lesion every 24 hour day 1-8 total 8 dos . - Arm VIII : Patients apply topical placebo target lesion every 24 hour day 1-8 total 8 dos .
